Text: Energy ForumDear Jeff Thank you for inviting me to participate in the energy policy forum event in Washington DC on October Ordinarily I would be happy to participate However my wife is scheduled to have hip surgery on October Judging from the last time she went through this I will have to stay around until she is out of the hospital and settled back at home Accordingly I am not planning any travel before October Too bad On another matter can you ask someone in your energy services company to get in touch with me I would like to set something up with MITs executive VP in charge of the business side of running MIT including energy purchases and management We have a MW cogenerator buy gas and electricity at wholesale and use lots of heating and cooling on an ever growing campus with students as many employees many computer facilities and laboratories Im sure that we can do it more efficiently and I have been encouraging the management to look for opportunities to outsource some or all of these activities I would like to put them in touch with someone at Enron Thanks Paul Professor Paul L Joskow Elizabeth and James Killian Professor of Economics and Management and Director MIT Center for Energy and Environmental Policy Research EB MIT Cambridge MA phone fax pjoskowwww
